docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Researchers have discovered a powerful new drug that has had stunning success in preventing rejection of transplanted organs in its earliest tests among more than 100 recipients at the University of Pittsburgh.

headline.main: New Drug Shows Stunning Success In Organ-Transplant Operations

docs.snippet: LEAD: Researchers have discovered a powerful new drug that has had stunning success in preventing rejection of transplanted organs in its earliest tests among more than 100 recipients at the University of Pittsburgh.

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: THE movement among psychiatrists to rely more and more on using drugs to treat mental disorders is coming under strong attack. Critics contend that scientific studies evaluating the effectiveness of psychiatric drugs have been systematically biased, exaggerating the medications' potency.

headline.main: Critics Challenge Reliance on DrugsIn Psychiatry
